WorkItem.ClosedComment:
This seems more fit for a discussion on the forums to see what other people think about it and to iterate on a design that may work.

Can you create a discussion in the language section of the discussion and add some examples of what you want to be able to do, but current can't.
WorkItem.Description:
let us use `vardule` since often a function is created by another function, and that fundule are often the only way to let us do `export =`
While I think that would not work for literal value those case could easily be caught by the compiler.
